Quickstrike:



Quickstrike stepped out of the CR chamber, with a cobra fused appendage on 
his head. He lowered it to his side after he heard Mantella call to him.

"Yeah, yeah." he said to his comm-link to Mantella. "Ev'rythin's fine. Ah 
got Shredder off mah back. Fine now. Where are ya?"

His eyes suddenly went bright as he heard the unfamilair voice of Stingtra, 
asking the word of 'mission'. It was perfect! He wouldn't have to go 
searching and risk his neck. "A mission! Yeah, yeah, ah'll give ya uh 
mission. Listen, whoever yer name is, ah want ya t' find uh stasis pod. 
Don't let it get uh beast mode! Stablize it and bring it back t' base!"

He walked out of the CR room. "Ah got uh plan." he continued.

>*Mantella sighed and lifted her Commlink to her mouth* Mantella: 
>Quickstrike?  I want to if your feeling alright and know if everyting is 
>going good down there. Is it? *Stingtra lifted her Commlink to her mouth* 
>Stingtra: Not to bother you but I would love a misson if you have any 
>avalable. *Drazom still sits on the rock by hisself. He take the leaves off 
>of the vine and opens a compartment on his other hand and pulls a little 
>drill out and starts drilling holes through all of the seashells and the 
>pebbles and a hole through the piece of Energon*
